", "title": "$:/themes/clevernote/config/editTemplate", "tags": "", "modified": "20190408183710561", "created": "20190408162256923" }, "$:/themes/tesseract/clevernote/stylesheet": { "created": "20171207163956055", "text": "body { margin: 0; padding: 0; border: 0; outline: 0; vertical-align: baseline; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; height: 100%; } body.tc-body { font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; word-wrap: break-word; color: #383838; background-color: #fff; fill: #383838; } .tc-drop-down { color: #606060; font-family: gotham,helvetica,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-weight: 500; padding: 15px 7px; border-radius: 2px; border: 3px solid rgba(217,217,217,.4); border-top: 1px solid rgba(217,217,217,.4); border-left: 1px solid rgba(217,217,217,.4); margin: 1rem; margin-top: 4px; min-width: calc(100% + 10px); width: -moz-fit-content; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(0,0,0,.04),-6px 8px 15px rgba(0,0,0,.04),6px 8px 15px rgba(0,0,0,.04); } .zaah-sidebar-container { position:fixed; left: 0; top:0; width: 5%; transition: width 0.2s ease-in-out, left 0.2s ease-in-out 0.3s; border-right: 1px solid #ececec; background-color: #f8f8f8; height: 100%; padding: 12px 12px 24px 17px; z-index: 200; box-sizing: border-box; } .zaah-listbar-container { display: block; padding: 24px 0 0 0; position: fixed; left: 5%; top: 0; width: 25%; height: 100vh; z-index: 500; border-right: 1px solid #ececec; background-color: #fff; overflow-y: auto; } .zaah-story-river { position: absolute; left: 30%; padding-left: 10px; width: 70%; top: 0;} .zaah-scrollable-menu { height: 80vh; position: relative; overflow: auto; } .zaah-sidebar-buttons { margin: auto; position: absolute; top: 20px; left: 20px; bottom: 0; line-height: 45px; z-index: 99; } .inline21caps { color: #878787; display: inline-block; vertical-align: top; font-size: 21px; letter-spacing: 0.5px; text-transform: uppercase; padding-left: 20px; } .zaah-btn-rounded, .zaah-btn-rounded:active { line-height: 1; margin: 0; border: 1px solid #E5E5E5; background: #fff; color: #2DBE60; fill: #2DBE60; border-radius: 70%; padding: 0; width: 36px; height: 36px; font-size: medium; transition: opacity 0.55s ease-in-out; } .zaah-btn-rounded:hover { border: 1px solid #2DBE60; border-radius: 70%; background: #2DBE60; color: #fff; fill: #fff; transition: opacity 0.25s ease-in-out; } .zaah-btn-rounded svg { height: 16pt; } .zaah-btn-square { line-height: 1; margin: 0; background: #fff; color: #2DBE60; fill: #2DBE60; border: 1px solid #c4c4c4; border-radius: 4px; padding: 0; height: 28px; width: 28px; font-size: medium; transition: opacity 0.55s ease-in-out; } .zaah-btn-square:hover{ background: #2DBE60; border: 1px solid #2DBE60; border-radius: 4px; } .zaah-btn-square svg { height: 13pt; } .zaah-btn-square:hover svg{ color: #fff !important; fill: #fff !important; } .legend { -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; font-family: gotham,helvetica,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 11px; font-weight: 400; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 1px; color: #ababab; margin: 7px 0 12px 20px; } .Selector .SelectorOption { width: 100%; padding: 9px 54px 10px 20px; transition-duration: .1s; transition-property: color,background; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; color: #606060; font-weight: 600; } .tc-more-sidebar { padding: 5% 0 0 5%; } .tc-tools-sidebar { padding: 5% 0 0 5%; } .tc-toc.toc-selective-expandable { padding-left: 10px; } .tc-sidebar { padding: 15% 0 0 10%; } li.toc-item { list-style: none; } .abovetitle{ height: 35px; border-bottom: 1px solid #ececec; } /* From original Sheet */ .tc-tiddler-frame { padding: 28px 72px 42px 42px; width: 100%; } .tc-tiddler-title { margin: 16px 0 1px 0; padding-right: 30px; } .tc-titlebar { font-size: 2.2em; } .tc-titlebar h2 { font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Lucida Grande", "DejaVu Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 28px; font-weight: 200; color: #2dbe60; line-height: 35px; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; } button.tc-tag-label, span.tc-tag-label { display: inline-block; font-size: 0.9em; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.2em; color: #606060; white-space: nowrap; background-color: #f8f8f8; vertical-align: top; border: 1px solid #ececec; padding: 1px 8px 1px; border-radius: 4px; } .tc-tiddler-controls .tc-drop-down { font-size: 16px; } .tc-tiddler-controls button.tc-btn-invisible:hover svg, .tc-search button:hover svg, .tc-search a:hover svg { fill: #333; } .tc-topbar-left { left: 32%; top: 5px; } textarea, input[type="text"], input[type="search"], input[type=""], input:not([type]) { color: #383838; background: #ffffff; border: 1px solid #cccccc; padding: 2px; } /* SearchBox */ .searchboxcontainterRoot { margin-right: 8px; display: inline-block; vertical-align: top; } .searchboxcontainer { display: inline-block; cursor: pointer; vertical-align: top; border: 1px solid #c4c4c4; border-radius: 4px; height: 28px; box-sizing: border-box; } .searchbox { color: #606060; font-weight: 400; padding: 7px 15px 0; font-family: gotham, helvetica, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; } .tc-topbar-right>p { margin: 0; } .small12ptsvg svg { height:12pt; } .small18ptsvg svg { height:18pt; } /* Topbar */ .zaah-topbar-container { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 30%; height: 35px; width: 100%; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95); } .tc-topbar-left svg { stroke: #807F83; stroke-width: 8px; } <$reveal state="$:/info/browser/screen/width" type="lteq" text="1000"> .bottombarcontainer { position: fixed; width: 100%; height: 8%; background-color: #F8F8F8; bottom: 0; left: 0; z-index: 2000; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } .bottombar { width: 100%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } .leftsidebarcontainer-mobile { position: fixed; left: 0; top: 0; height: 100%; width: 15%; max-width: 75px; z-index: 1500; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; background-color: #F8F8F8; } .leftsidebarcontainer-mobile { position: fixed; left: 0; top: 0; height: 100%; width: 15%; z-index: 1500; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; background-color: #F8F8F8; } .leftsidebar-mobile { justify-content: center; display: flex; flex-direction: column; } .switch-container { position: fixed; bottom: 5px; left: 5px; z-index: 2500; } .zaah-listbar-container-mobile { position: fixed; left: 15%; top: 0; background: #fff; height: 100%; z-index: 200; padding: 24px 0 0 0; width: 100%; overflow: auto; } @media screen and (min-width: 500px) { .zaah-listbar-container-mobile { left:75px; } } .zaah-story-river { left: 0; width: 100%; } .tc-tiddler-frame { padding: 28px 20px 42px 22px; width: 100%; } .zaah-btn-square { height: 36px; width: 36px; } .searchbar-container { z-index:1800; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; background: #f4f4f4; width: 100%; } .searchbar { width: 100%; height: 50px; z-index: 2500; } .jd-searchbar { width: calc(100% - 20px); height: 30px; font-size: 16px !important; background: transparent !important; padding: 0 140px 0 10px; margin: 10px; } input.jd-searchbar { border: none; border-bottom-width: medium; border-bottom-style: none; border-bottom-color: currentcolor; border-bottom: 2px solid #5778d8; } .searchresults-mobile { width: 100%; padding-left: 5%; padding-bottom: 2%; } .searchresultbuttons svg { height: 20px; width: 20px; } /* Editor Toolbar*/ .tc-edit-tags { margin-bottom:12px } .tc-editor-toolbar { position: -webkit-sticky; position: sticky; top: 0px; /* distance to stick from top, e.g if you use top bar */ left:0; width:100%; font-size:1em; line-height:0; padding:0; border:5px solid transparent; background:white; margin-top:-11px; /* pull it up */ } .tc-editor-toolbar:hover { border-color:white; } .tc-editor-toolbar button { display:inline-block; padding:0px; } /* Sidebar*/ .zaah-listbar-container-mobile .tc-sidebar { padding: 5% 0 0 3%; } /*Edit Template*/ .tc-tiddler-frame.tc-tiddler-edit-frame { padding: 28px 5px 42px 5px; } .zaah-btn-edit-template svg { height: 20px; } <$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/edittemplatefield" text="hide"> .tc-edit-field-add, .tc-edit-fields {display:none;} <$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/edittemplatetype" text="hide"> .tc-type-selector {display:none;} .tc-block-dropdown { position: fixed; top: 10%; left: 0; padding: 2%; width: 100%; overflow: auto; max-height: 50%; } .sidebar { left: 0; width: 73px; transition: width 0.2s ease-in-out, left 0.2s ease-in-out 0.3s; position: fixed; top: 0; } .bar-left { border-right: 1px solid #ececec; background-color: #f8f8f8; height: 100%; float: left; padding: 12px 12px 24px 17px; transition: width 0.2s ease-in-out, left 0.2s ease-in-out; z-index: 200; box-sizing: border-box; } .sidebar-inner { height: 100%; float: left; width: 42px; transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out; } .sidebar-buttons { height: 100%; float: left; width: 42px; transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out; } .logo-container { height: 66px; } .logo { display: inline-block; width: 36px; height: 36px; margin-right: 36px; margin-bottom: 30px; position: relative; outline: none; } .clev-pagecontrol-container{ margin-bottom: 48px; } .clev-pagecontrol-button-container-level1 { height: 30px; } .clev-pagecontrol-button-container-level2 { display: inline-block; width: 42px; height: 42px; position: relative; outline: none; } .clev-pagecontrol-button-container-level3 { position: relative; } .clev-pagecontrol-button-container-level4 { outline: none; cursor: pointer; padding: 6px 0; height: 36px; } .clev-pagecontrol-button-container-level4 button { line-height: 1; margin: 0; border: 1px solid #E5E5E5; background: #fff; color: #2DBE60; fill: #2DBE60; border-radius: 70%; padding: 0; width: 36px; height: 36px; font-size: medium; transition: opacity 0.55s ease-in-out; } .clev-pagecontrol-button-container-level4 button:hover { border: 1px solid #2DBE60; border-radius: 70%; background: #2DBE60; color: #fff; fill: #fff; transition: opacity 0.25s ease-in-out; } code, samp, kbd { text-align: left; color: #333; } pre code { line-height: 1.6em; font-size: 15px; } pre { background-color: #FFF9C4; padding: 2em 2em 2em 2em; border-left: 11px solid #FFD600; margin: 1.7em 0 1.7em 0.3em; overflow: auto; width: 93%; } /* target IE7 and IE6 */ *:first-child+html pre { padding-bottom: 2em; overflow-y: hidden; overflow: visible; overflow-x: auto; } * html pre { padding-bottom: 2em; overflow: visible; overflow-x: auto; }", "bag": "default", "revision": "2", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/themes/tesseract/clevernote/stylesheet", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "modified": "20190426050156576", "list-after": "$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/base" } } }
